response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. Considering its true worth and your potential to benefit greatly from it, we propose an offer of $950,000 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to ensuring that both parties receive fair value. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
